Topic.Title: Passage and Section turning out blank (and) line not working.

I'm so confused........so confused.......so.......con.......fu.......sed......*shutdown*

Posts.EditableText: Are the hashtags just for visual effect? If so, fine. Otherwise, you don't need them. I think putting a comma in a passage title is screwing up that passage. You can avoid this by using a different title, and including it after the link, like this: ["Hey there, Wills."](Hey Wills) [Hey Wills]: You strike up a conversation with Willem in a nonchalant, ignoble manner. You know a knight shouldn't speak like this, but ... Another thing to be aware of: - You can make a direct link to a different section, but not to a passage in a different section. If you haven't read the docs, . . . they are here: http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/
Posts.HTML:
Are the hashtags just for visual effect? If so, fine. Otherwise, you don't need them.

I think putting a comma in a passage title is screwing up that passage. You can avoid this by using a different title, and including it after the link, like this:

["Hey there, Wills."](Hey Wills)

[Hey Wills]:
You strike up a conversation with Willem in a nonchalant, ignoble manner. You know a knight shouldn't speak like this, but ...

Another thing to be aware of: - You can make a direct link to a different section, but not to a passage in a different section.

If you haven't read the docs, . . . they are here:
http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/
